verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> unto <S%G4152>spiritual<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> unto <S%G4559>carnal<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> unto <S%G3516>babes<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

I <S%G4222>fed<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> with <S%G1051>milk<s%>, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> with <S%G1033>meat<s%>; for1063, 3768 ye were not yet <S%G1410>able<s%> to bear <S%G235>it<s%>: <S%G3777>nay<s%>, not <S%G2089>even<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> are ye <S%G1410>able<s%>;

for <S%G1063><s%> ye <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G4559>carnal<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3699>whereas<s%> there is <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2205>jealousy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2054>strife<s%>, are <S%G2075>ye<s%> <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G4559>carnal<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> do ye not <S%G4043>walk<s%> after the <S%G2596>manner<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%>, I1473, Ezekiel3 <S%G1510>am<s%> of <S%G3972>Paul<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> am of <S%G625>Apollos<s%>; are <S%G2075>ye<s%> <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G4559>men<s%>?

What <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G625>Apollos<s%>? <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is <S%G3972>Paul<s%>? 235, 2228 <S%G1249>Ministers<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5101>whom<s%> ye <S%G4100>believed<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> each <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> gave <S%G1325>to<s%> <S%G1538>him<s%>.
I <S%G5452>planted<s%>, <S%G625>Apollos<s%> <S%G4222>watered<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> gave the <S%G837>increase<s%>.

So <S%G5620>then<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> is <S%G2076>he<s%> that <S%G5452>planteth<s%> <S%G5100>anything<s%>, <S%G3777>neither<s%> he that <S%G4222>watereth<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> that giveth the <S%G837>increase<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G5452>planteth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G4222>watereth<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1520>each<s%> shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3408>reward<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G2873>labor<s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G4904>fellow-workers<s%>: ye <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G1091>husbandry<s%>, <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G3619>building<s%>.

According <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G753>masterbuilder<s%> I <S%G5087>laid<s%> a <S%G2310>foundation<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> buildeth <S%G2026>thereon<s%>. <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G991>let<s%> each <S%G1538>man<s%> take <S%G991>heed<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> he buildeth <S%G2026>thereon<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G2310>foundation<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G5087>lay<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> that which is <S%G2749>laid<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2026>buildeth<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G5126>the<s%> <S%G2310>foundation<s%> <S%G5557>gold<s%>, <S%G696>silver<s%>, <S%G5093>costly<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%>, <S%G3586>wood<s%>, <S%G5528>hay<s%>, <S%G2562>stubble<s%>;

each <S%G1538>man<s%>'s <S%G2041>work<s%> shall be <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5318>manifest<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> shall declare <S%G1213>it<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> it is <S%G601>revealed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4442>fire<s%> itself shall <S%G1381>prove<s%> each <S%G1538>man<s%>'s <S%G2041>work<s%> of what <S%G3697>sort<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%>.
If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%>'s <S%G2041>work<s%> shall <S%G3306>abide<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he built <S%G2026>thereon<s%>, he shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> a <S%G3306>reward<s%>.

If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%>'s <S%G2041>work<s%> shall be <S%G2618>burned<s%>, he shall suffer <S%G2210>loss<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> he <S%G846>himself<s%> shall be <S%G4982>saved<s%>; <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%>.

Know <S%G1492>ye<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> ye <S%G2075>are<s%> a <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> that the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3611>dwelleth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>?

If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G5351>destroyeth<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G5126>him<s%> <S%G5351>shall<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5351>destroy<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%>, and <S%G3748>such<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%>.

Let <S%G1818><s%> no <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G1818>deceive<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%>. <S%G1487>If<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1380>thinketh<s%> that he <S%G1511>is<s%> <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G165>world<s%>, let him <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G3474>fool<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he may <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G4680>wise<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3472>foolishness<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>. <S%G1063>For<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, He that <S%G1405>taketh<s%> the <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> their <S%G3834>craftiness<s%>:
and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>, The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1097>knoweth<s%> the <S%G3152>reasonings<s%> of the <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G3152>vain<s%>.
Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> <S%G2744>let<s%> no <S%G3367>one<s%> <S%G2744>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>. <S%G1063>For<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G5216>yours<s%>;

whether <S%G1535><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G625>Apollos<s%>, <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2786>Cephas<s%>, <S%G1535>or<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>, <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>, <S%G1535>or<s%> things <S%G1764>present<s%>, <S%G1535>or<s%> things to <S%G3195>come<s%>; <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G5216>yours<s%>;
and <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> are <S%G5547>Christ<s%>'s; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G2316>God<s%>'s.
